Steps.Message: Update at 17:43 - Hi, this is David from the UK Power Networks messaging team. Thanks for your patience this evening. Our engineers have been in contact with us to let us know that the extent of work required to remove the trees from the overhead cables is proving much more complex then originally thought.To give them time to do this safely, the estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 21:30 and 22:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

We became aware of this power cut at 15:07. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Our engineers have been in contact with us to let us know that the extent of work required to remove the trees from the overhead cables is proving much more complex then originally thought.To give them time to do this safely, the estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 21:30 and 22:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: Our engineers are currently working to find out what caused this power cut.
